paper.title: The Collapse of the Polynomial Hierarchy: NP = P

chunks.label: Abstract & claim
covers: Claims NP=P via polynomial-time perfect matching counting

chunks.label: Introduction & motivation
covers: Perfect matching problem background; historical context

chunks.label: Core technique: Sn generating sets
covers: Mapping symmetric group generators to graph-theoretic generators; stabilizer chains

chunks.label: Generating graph & CVMP paths
covers: Î“(n) definition; VMPs and CVMPs; edge requirements

chunks.label: Partition & MinSet sequences
covers: CVMPSet partition; MinSet definition; covering MinSets

chunks.label: Counting algorithm & complexity
covers: Algorithm 2.1; claimed O(n^45 log n) time; correctness lemma
